sentences.cn: 一切描述必定都是选择的.

sentences.en: Antibiotics produce a selective change in flora.
sentences.cn: 抗菌素引起菌丛的选择性变化.

sentences.en: Antibotics are somewhat selective in their antibacterial actions.
sentences.cn: 抗菌素的抗菌谱略有选择性.

sentences.en: He has a very selective memory (= he chooses what he wants to remember and what to forget ) .
He seemed to have a very selective recall of past events.
sentences.cn: 他好像对过去的事情有选择地回忆.

sentences.en: If public figures seek publicity to further their careers, they can't be selective about it.
sentences.cn: 如果公众人物想通过吸引公众的关注来推进事业，他们可能会不加选择。
记忆有选择性而且会出错。

sentences.en: Mr Robins, suffering from selective amnesia about his role in the affair, was contradicted in nearly every instance by other witnesses.
sentences.cn: 对于自己在该事件中所扮演的角色，罗宾斯先生患上了选择性失忆症，因此几乎在每次庭审中都会受到其他证人的反驳。

sentences.en: Partial radiation pyrometers are sensitive to narrow selective wavebands.
sentences.cn: 部分辐射高温计在窄的选择波段上是灵敏的.

sentences.en: Sales still happen, but buyers are more selective.
sentences.cn: 销量仍在，但购买者更加挑剔。

sentences.en: Selective aversion to certain risks may entail acceptance of other greater risks.
sentences.cn: 有选择地回避某些风险可能招致更大的风险.

sentences.en: She is selective about the clothes she buys.
The brain is selective about which nutrients it removes from the blood.
sentences.cn: 脑对于从血液中取走哪些营养物是有选择的.

sentences.en: The superficial layers are often frequency selective to transmission.
sentences.cn: 表层传播一般都有频率选择性.

sentences.en: There is potential for selective breeding for better yields.
sentences.cn: 选种培育以提高产量会大有可为。

words.tran_cn: 精选的；挑选出来的；极好的

phrases.tran_cn: 信息的选择性传播；资讯的选择性传播

trans.tran_cn: 精心选择的，选择的，不普遍的，淘汰的
trans.tran_en: careful about what you choose to do, buy, allow etc
